%spark
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.{Vector, Vectors}
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Matrix
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.SingularValueDecomposition
import com.nec.frovedis.Jexrpc.FrovedisServer
import com.nec.frovedis.matrix.RowMatrixUtils._
def createVector(line: String, size: Int) : Vector = {
    val item = line.split(" ")
    val vlen = item.length
    var data = Array.ofDim[Double](vlen)
    var idx = Array.ofDim[Int](vlen)
    for(i <- 0 until vlen) {
      val idxdata = item(i).split(":")
      idx(i) = idxdata(0).toInt
      data(i) = idxdata(1).toDouble
    }
    Vectors.sparse(size, idx, data)
}

val size = 18162
val vectors=sc.textFile("file://" + sys.env("INSTALLPATH") + "/data/demo/ratings_matrix",8).map(line=>createVector(line, size))
val mat: RowMatrix = new RowMatrix(vectors)

import scala.io.Source

val s = Source.fromFile(sys.env("INSTALLPATH") + "/data/demo/movielist")
val movielist = try s.getLines.toArray finally s.close

%spark val k = 200 FrovedisServer.initialize("mpirun -np 1 " + sys.env("FROVEDIS_SERVER")) val start = System.currentTimeMillis val ret = mat.computeSVDUsingFrovedis(k) val svd: SingularValueDecomposition[RowMatrix, Matrix] = ret.to_spark_result(sc) printf("%%html\n

Spark with Frovedis: training time = %d sec

\n", (System.currentTimeMillis - start)/1000) FrovedisServer.shut_down() val U: RowMatrix = svd.U val s: Vector = svd.s val V: Matrix = svd.V

%spark val userID = 5669 //val userID = 135 val alreadyRated = mat.rows.zipWithIndex.map{case (k,v) => (v,k)}.lookup(userID)(0).toSparse val ratedPair = alreadyRated.values.zip(alreadyRated.indices).sorted.reverse.take(5) printf("\n%%html\n\n",userID) ratedPair.map(t => printf("",movielist(t._2))) printf("
Movies highly rated by user (ID:%d)
%s
\n") val ratedSet = alreadyRated.indices.toSet val userVec = U.rows.zipWithIndex.map{case (k,v) => (v,k)}.lookup(userID)(0).toDense val userVec_s = userVec.toArray.zip(s.toArray).map(i => i._1 * i._2) val toRecommend = V.multiply(Vectors.dense(userVec_s)).toArray.zipWithIndex.sorted.reverse.take(6+ratedSet.size).filterNot(t => ratedSet.contains(t._2)).take(5) println("
\n") toRecommend.map(t => printf("",movielist(t._2),t._1)) printf("
Recommending moviesEvalation
%s%.3f
\n")
